item.hyrule_terrors.zora_armor.tooltip: Wearing the full set grants Water Breathing & Swim Speed Boost!
item.hyrule_terrors.barbarian_armor.tool: Wearing the full set grants Damage Boost!
item.hyrule_terrors.knight_armor.tooltip: Wearing the full set grants Damage Resistance!
item.hyrule_terrors.evil_spirit.tooltip: Wearing the full set grants Damage Boost and Night Vision!
item.chuchu_jelly.tooltip: A gelatinous substance that came from a chuchu. It's unusable in this state.
item.chuchu_jelly.tooltip1: Consume for a random effect or craft into Slime balls.
item.bokoblin_horn.tooltip: A sharp horn with multiple barbs.
item.bokoblin_fang.tooltip: It's worn down and not very sharp, but its still pretty hard.
item.bokoblin_fang.tooltip1: Can be crafted into Yellow Dye.
item.lizalfos_horn.tooltip1: Can be crafted into White Dye or a Dagger.
item.lizalfos_tail.tooltip: The severed tail of a Lizalfos. It continues to wriggle even after being separated from its body.
item.lizalfos_talon.tooltip: This talon once grew from the elbow of a Lizalfos.
item.lizalfos_talon.tooltip1: Can be crafted into Grey Dye.
text.autoconfig.hyrule_terrors.title: Hyrule Terror's Config Options
item.hyrule_terrors.silver_longsword.too: A sleek Zora blade, glimmering with elegance.
Deals extra damage when wet. Even more powerful when wearing full Zora armor.
item.hyrule_terrors.knights_claymore.too: A mighty blade once wielded by Hyrule's knights.
Heavy and slow, but devastating. Gains bonus damage with full Knight Armor.
item.hyrule_terrors.boulder_breaker.tool: Daruk’s prized weapon, forged to crush stone and bone.
Smashes armored foes, slows enemies, and breaks stone with ease.
item.bokoblin_arm.tooltip1: A brittle arm torn from a Bokoblin. May even fly out of your hand when swinging.
advancements.hyrule_terrors.description: Embark on a new adventure with Hyrule Monsters, Armors, and Items!!
advancements.hyrule_terrors.title: Hyrule Terror's
